titleStmt.title: Concerning the Errata or faults escaped in printing.

publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

analytic.title: Concerning the Errata or faults escaped in printing.

monogr.title: A helpe to discovrse. Or, A miscelany of merriment : Consisting of wittie, philosophical and astronomicall questions and answers. As also, of epigrams, epitaphs, riddles, and iests. Together with the covntrymans counsellour, next his yearely oracle or prognostication to consult with. Contayning diuers necessary rules and obseruations of much vse and consequence being knowne. By W.B. and E.P

div.head: Concerning the Errata or faults escaped in printing.
div.p: If by the absence of the Authour, difficultie of the hand, misplacing of points, some sillables or words mistaken, the sence in any place be obscured, the iudicious Reader may be so pleased to correct such easie faults which by these meanes haue escaped, which though we know are some, yet we hope are not many.
